casebody.data:
No. 09-951. National Right to Work Legal Defense Foundation, Inc., Petitioner v. UNITE (Union of Needletrades, Industrial & Textile Employees, AFL-CIO), et al. 562 U.S. 827, 131 S. Ct. 65,

178 L. Ed. 2d 22,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6197. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 585 F.3d 741.
